text: niyata vaśayenma apima viyaḷī giya bhūmiya desaṭa (væsi) valākuḷu padavā gos (vasinnaṭa salasvā) emagin movunda, movungē (eḷu, gava, oṭuvan væni) satunda āhārayaṭa gata hæki bhōgada (taṇa, gas kolan ādiya)da ikut karannemu yanna ovun avadhānaya kaḷē nædda? (meya pavā) ovun avadhānaya kara bæliya yutu novēda
